LanguageData.BuildBalista_Crate.label: 制作弩炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildBalista_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a neolithic balista。
LanguageData.BuildCatapult_Crate.label: 制作石弩组件箱
LanguageData.BuildCatapult_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a catapult that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned。
LanguageData.BuildM240B_Crate.label: 建造 7.62x51mm M240B 重机枪组件箱
LanguageData.BuildM240B_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 7.62x51mm M240B MG, a type of stationary manned turret。
LanguageData.BuildM240B_Crate.jobString: 建造 7.62x51mm M240B 重机枪组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildMinigunTurret_Crate.label: 建造 7.62x51mm M134 速射机枪组件箱
LanguageData.BuildMinigunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 7.62x51mm M134 Minigun, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 7.62x51mm ammo。
LanguageData.BuildMinigunTurret_Crate.jobString: 建造 7.62x51mm M134 速射机枪组件箱
LanguageData.BuildMGTurret_Crate.label: 建造 50BMG M2 勃朗宁重机枪组件箱
LanguageData.BuildMGTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 50BMG M2 Browning MG, a type of stationary manned turret。
LanguageData.BuildMGTurret_Crate.jobString: 建造 50BMG M2 Browning 重机枪组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildKPV_Crate.label: 建造 14.5mm KPV 重机枪组件箱
LanguageData.BuildKPV_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 14.5mm KPV MG, a type of stationary manned turret. Requires 14.5mm bullets for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildKPV_Crate.jobString: 建造 14.5mm KPV 重机枪组件箱
LanguageData.BuildOerlikonautocannon_Crate.label: 建造 20x102mm 欧瑞康机炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildOerlikonautocannon_Crate.descriptio: Use this to 建造 an Oerlikon autocannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 20x102mm for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildOerlikonautocannon_Crate.jobString: 建造 20x102mm 欧瑞康机炮组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildVulcanCannon_Crate.label: 建造 20mm 火神炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildVulcanCannon_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 20mm Vulcan Cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. Requires 800 W to function and it uses 20mmx20 Vulcan Bullets for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildVulcanCannon_Crate.jobString: 建造 20mm 火神炮组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildChain_Crate.label: 建造 30x165mm GSh-30 火炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildChain_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 30x165mm GSh-30 cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30x165mm for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildChain_Crate.jobString: 建造 30x165mm GSh-30 火炮组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildAvenger_Crate.label: 建造 30x165mm GAU-8 复仇者火炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildAvenger_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 30x165mm GAU-8 Avenger, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30x165mm shells for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildAvenger_Crate.jobString: 建造 30x165mm GAU-8 复仇者火炮组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildAGSturret_Crate.label: 建造 30mm AGS-17组件箱
LanguageData.BuildAGSturret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a AGS-17, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL Turret Grenades for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildAGCturret_Crate.label: 建造 30mm AGS-30组件箱
LanguageData.BuildAGCturret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 AGS-30, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL Turret Grenades for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildMortar_Crate.label: 建造 81mm 迫击炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildMortar_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a mortar launcher, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 81mm Explosive Mortar Shells for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildMortar_Crate.jobString: 建造 81mm 迫击炮组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildFlakTurret_Crate.label: 建造 90mm 高射炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.BuildFlakTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 90mm Flak turret a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 90mm Cannon Shells for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildFlakTurret_Crate.jobString: 建造 90mm 高射炮塔组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildCannonTurret_Crate.label: 建造 120mm 坦克炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildCannonTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 120mm Tank Cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildCannonTurret_Crate.jobString: 建造 120mm 坦克炮组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildHowitzerTurret_Crate.label: 建造 155mm 榴弹炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildHowitzerTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a 155m Howitzer Cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 155mm Howitzer Shells for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildHowitzerTurret_Crate.jobString: 建造 155mm 榴弹炮组件箱
LanguageData.BuildTOW_Crate.label: 建造 BGM-71 TOW轻型导弹系统组件箱
LanguageData.BuildTOW_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a Light Missile System BGM-71 TOW, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses AT missiles for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildTOW_Crate.jobString: 建造 AT missile BGM-71 TOW组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildLightMissileSystem_Crate.label: 建造 FGM-148 标枪导弹系统组件箱
LanguageData.BuildLightMissileSystem_Crate.descriptio: Use this to 建造 a Light Missile System FGM-148 Javelin, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses AT missile for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildLightMissileSystem_Crate.jobString: 建造 AT missile FGM-148 Javelin组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildMediumMissileSystem_Crate.label: 建造 130mm 中型导弹系统组件箱
LanguageData.BuildMediumMissileSystem_Crate.descripti: Use this to 建造 a Medium Missile System, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 130mmx2 Missiles for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildMediumMissileSystem_Crate.jobString: 建造 130mm 中型导弹系统组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildRocketLauncher_Crate.label: 建造 130mm 重型导弹系统组件箱
LanguageData.BuildRocketLauncher_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a Heavy Missile System, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 130mmx3 missiles for ammo。
LanguageData.BuildRocketLauncher_Crate.jobString: 建造 130mm 重型导弹系统组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildSentryTurret_Crate.label: 建造 .40 轻型自动炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.BuildSentryTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 an automated sentry light turret, a type of stationary automatic turret. It requires power to function。
LanguageData.BuildSentryTurret_Crate.jobString: 建造 .40 Rimfire Sentry light组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildHeavyTurret_Crate.label: 建造 145x114mm 重型自动炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.BuildHeavyTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a laser turret, a type of unmanned automatic turret. It requires power to function。
LanguageData.BuildNavalGunTurret_Crate.label: 建造 30x165mm 哨兵炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.BuildNavalGunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 Sentry naval turret, a type of stationary unmanned turret。
LanguageData.BuildSentryRocketLauncher_Crate.label: 建造 AT missile 自动火箭发射器组件箱
LanguageData.BuildSentryRocketLauncher_Crate.descript: Use this to 建造 an Sentry rocket launcher, a type of stationary unmanned turret。
LanguageData.BuildSentryRocketLauncher_Crate.jobStrin: 建造 AT missile Sentry rocket launcher组件箱。
LanguageData.BuildSentryBlasterTurret_Crate.label: 建造 6x24mm 自动炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.BuildSentryBlasterTurret_Crate.descripti: Use this to 建造 a sentry blaster turret组件箱, a type of automatic turrets. Requires power to function。
LanguageData.BuildLaserTurret_Crate.label: 建造 激光炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.BuildLaserTurret_Crate.description: Use this to 建造 a Laser Turret, a type of unmanned automatic turret. It requires power to function。
LanguageData.BuildLaserTurret_Crate.jobString: 建造 激光炮塔组件箱
